chunks.text: If you could give your younger self some advice, what would it be?
I think the most important thing is finding the good balance between your out-of-school life and your school life,
because once you get that balance right, everything else flows long pretty well. If you could give one piece of advice to your younger self, what would it be?
Don't get into petty arguments with your friends.
Just don't sweet the small stuff and be kind to each other and you'll have a much more fun time at school.

text: If you could give your younger self some advice, what would it be? I think the most important thing is finding the good balance between your out-of-school life and your school life, because once you get that balance right, everything else flows long pretty well. If you could give one piece of advice to your younger self, what would it be? Don't get into petty arguments with your friends. Just don't sweet the small stuff and be kind to each other and you'll have a much more fun time at school.
